column5: Does anyone know what the reception is like in the Grand Junction/ Pas area?
I have xm and have used it all the way up to withing 3 hours of the northwest territories border here in sask. with no troubles.
You will have no problems i have Sirus radio and i live north of the Pas 5 hours north I use my sirus when i'm south fishing the Grassy river area lakes :) it works everywhere :)
